string-array.name: IELTS_translation
string-array.item: "Overall quality or character as seen or judged by people in general"
"To pay someone something in exchange for something is lost or damaged"
"A rapid spread or increase in the occurrence of something"
"Make smaller or less in amount, degree, or size"
"An advantage or profit gained from something"
"Planned or carried out with great care"
"Anything that can be used to prove something"
"To make or hold stable, firm, or steadfast"
"To give something in order to achieve something together with other people"
"Represent something as being better, or worse than it really is"
"The use of such movements to express thought, emotion, etc."
"Combine or cause to combine to form a single entity"
"A person who watches at a show, game, or other event"
"A group of people marching in ceremony, celebration, or protest"
"Being effective without wasting time or effort or expense"
"To provide (someone) with necessary materials or supplies"
"Goods transported by truck, train, ship, or aircraft"
"The act or process of introducing new ideas, devices, or methods"
"Something that encourages a person to do something or to work harder"
"A usually good quality or feature that someone or something has"
"A person or thing that brings something into existence"
"A person who has studied a subject for a long time and knows a lot about it"
"To end (something, such as an argument) by reaching an agreement"
"Devote (time, effort, or oneself) to a particular task or purpose."
"A way of behaving that shows a willingness to obey rules or orders"
"Average in size or amount : neither too much nor too little"
"To show or reveal (something) to others for the first time"
"Capable of being done or used, workable"
"To travel on a boat or ship to a number of places as a vacation"
"Sudden, violent movements of air or water, a state of confusion, violence, or disorder"
"Consistently good in quality or performance; able to be trusted"
"Continuing for an extended period or without interruption"
"The process of keeping heat, sound, or electricity from spreading"
"Excessive pride in or admiration of one's own appearance or achievements"
"To say or write something as an answer to a question or request"
"To gather or acquire (something) gradually as time passes"
"To officially decide (something) especially because of evidence or facts : to establish (something) exactly or with authority"
"The process of turning from liquid into vapor"
"An ornamental border of threads left loose or formed into tassels or twists"
"To plan and do (something, such as an activity)"
"Willingness to accept feelings, habits, or beliefs that are different from your own"
"Of or relating to a situation in which people or groups are trying to win a contest or be more successful than others"
"Accept or admit the existence or truth of"
"Make (someone or something) look or feel younger, fresher, or more lively"
"The action of clearing a wide area of trees"
"The surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates"
"The natural home or environment of an animal, plant, or other organism"
"The sale of goods to the public in relatively small quantities"
"Strong disagreement about something among a large group of people"
"Something that is currently popular or fashionable"
"Give all or a large part of one's time or resources to (a person, activity, or cause)"
"Having or showing the capacity to become or develop into something in the future."
"A sum of money saved or made available for a particular purpose"
"To interrupt the normal progress or activity of (something)"
"Produce and discharge (something, especially gas or radiation)"
"Giving good value or service in relation to the amount of money, time, or effort spent"
"The action of supervising someone or something"
"A person who takes part in something"
"Make a choice from a range of possibilities"
"A planned piece of work that has a specific purpose"
"To make (something, such as a task or action) slow or difficult"
"A part that forms when you tie a piece of rope, string, fabric, etc., to itself or to something else"
"Moving in a smooth and attractive way"
"A formal ceremony or series of acts that is always performed in the same way"
" to stop something from reaching its intended destination"
"Something is full of tiny holes or openings or easily penetrated"
"Referred to a person, animal, or plant unable to reproduce"
"Something that takes place in the daytime or has a daily cycle"
"Suffer or something that remain in existence"
"An achievement that requires great courage, skill, or strength."
"Best or most favorable for a given situation"
"A specific kind of animals or plants that can breed with each other"
"To go in a direction that is away from the place where you should be"
"Things that are very different from each other"
"A process that has been set up to accomplish a particular goal"
"To burn something with flame or heat"
"Basic truth, theory, rule, belief, or idea"
"Without realizing or being aware of one's actions"
"Ability to see clearly with your eyes"
"Introducing or using new ideas or methods"
"The condition of being grossly fat or overweight."
"Relating to the body of a person instead of the mind"
"Something that causes a change or a reaction"
"Very different, strange, or unusual because it comes from a distant country"
"To keep several objects in motion in the air at the same time by repeatedly throwing and catching them"
"The vehicle that produces the power that pulls a train"
"Number of people in a geographic area"
"Hold (someone) closely in one's arms, especially as a sign of affection."
"Work or operate in a proper or particular way"
"A flat slab of stone, clay, or wood, used especially for an inscription"
"Something that is a symbol of a feeling, event, etc."
"To say that (something) will or might happen in the future"
"Any one of the parts into which a word is naturally divided when it is pronounced"
"A circular arrangement of flowers, worn or hung for decoration"
"To make (something) new, fresh, or strong again"
"In a way that attracts or deserves attention"
"Cause (someone) to become unable to move or walk properly"
"A building at a boarding school, college, or university where students live"
"To try to get or win something (such as a prize or reward) that someone else is also trying to win"
"The place where something begins or ends"
"The act or process of giving someone a reason for doing something"
"A job, activity, etc., that is very suitable for someone"
"The pointed or tapered end of something"
"To cause (someone) to believe that something is true"
"A person who cuts hair, especially men's"
"Having an important or dangerous possible result"
"A drink, especially one other than water"
"To create or form something especially by heating and shaping metal"
"Fly or rise high in the air"
"Done in a planned and deliberate way usually by several or many people"
"A decline in economic, business, or other activity"
"Common in a particular place at a particular time"
"To try to reach the same position, score, etc."
"Able to make choices quickly and confidently"
"To show that something is real or correct"
"To be present in large numbers or in great quantity"
"Difficult to stand on, move on, or hold because of being smooth, wet, icy, etc."
"A patent is a government document that proves that an invention is yours and yours alone"
"An actor's part in a play, movie, etc."
"The act of looking at things to see how they are similar or different"
"A condition or fact that affects a situation"
"The action of giving someone support, confidence, or hope"
"Used and accepted by most people or usual"
"Improve or enhance the quality or value"
"A task or piece of work assigned to someone as part of a job or course of study"
"To submit a legal accusation, complaint, or request to some official authority"
"The process of being mentally stimulated to do or feel something, especially to do something creative"
"A person who is very sick or injured and needs frequent care"
"A person or organization that puts money into financial schemes, property, etc. with the expectation of achieving a profit."
"The act or process of improving something by removing unwanted substances"
"Money that a bank or business will allow a person to use and then pay back in the future"
"An empty space in which there is no air or other gas"
"Accusing someone (in court) of doing something wrong or illegal and demanding that they pay for it"
"The highness or lowness of a sound"
"To make (something) last or continue for a longer time"
" a device with two or more blades that turn quickly and cause a ship or aircraft to move"
"To lift or move (something) so that one side is higher than another side"
"Break or cause to break suddenly and completely"
"An act of towing a vehicle or boat"
"Operating or living or growing in water"
"An impressive display or an ordered series."
"Relating to the earth or its inhabitants"
"All the plants or plant life of a place, taken as a whole"
"Cold-blooded vertebrate typically living on land but breeding in water"
"Something that remains after a part is removed"
"The variety of plants and animals in a particular place"
"A half of a sphere or a half of the earth"
"To make weaker, thinner or lessen the strength"
"A sandhill formed by the wind near the sea or in a desert"
"The process by which a green plant turns water and carbon dioxide into food when the plant is exposed to light"
"The act of giving your attention to a single object or activity"
"Having or covered with many sharp, pointed parts"
"To keep (something) safe or from being damaged or destroyed"
"Slowly and carefully : in a way that is not hurried"
"Of or relating to the ability to think in a logical way"
"Someone who does not take action but instead let things happen to them"
"An activity that you enjoy doing during your free time"
"A sudden strong desire to do something"
"Belonging to the very distant past and no longer in existence"
"To send (a case) back to another court of law to be tried or dealt with again"
"To make changes and repairs to an old house"
"A two-wheeled horse-drawn vehicle used in ancient warfare and racing."
"To make (something, such as a sculpture or design) by cutting off pieces of the material it is made of"
"A person who travels some distance to work on a regular basis."
"Walk doggedly and slowly with heavy steps"
"To lie or sit with your arms and legs spread wide apart"
"Write or carve (words or symbols) on something"
"The myths of a particular group or culture"
"A tall, thin grass that grows in wet areas"
"To go somewhere with (someone) : to be a companion for (someone)"
"To bring (a memory, feeling, image, etc.) into the mind"
"An oversimplified image or idea of a particular type of person or thing"
"Reach a climax or point of highest development"
"The condition of being weak and delicate"
"Something that is false or not real but that seems to be true or real"
"To describe (someone or something) in a particular way"
"To support (something) by placing it against something else or by placing something under it"
"Comedy that involves physical action (such as falling down or hitting people)"
"Relating to a person's body, especially as opposed to their spirit"
"Manage and be responsible for the running of (a business, organization, etc.)"
"The main body or stalk of a plant or shrub"
"Load (someone) with too many things to carry"
"A pill or substance that is given to a patient like a drug but that has no physical effect on the patient"
"A flat structure that is used for floating or sailing on water"
"Try hard to do or achieve something"
"Officially register as a member of an institution or a student on a course"
"A place where people go for vacations"
"A branch of science that deals with plant life"
"Design or produce (something) to meet someone's individual requirements"
"A large business that is made of different kinds of companies"
"Always acting or behaving in the same way"
"A public or official statement of support or approval"
"To do or perform better than (someone or something)"
"A piece of bent metal or wire pushed through something or clipped over it as a fastening"
"To discuss something important in order to make a decision"
"A thing that is helpful or beneficial"
"Occur at or during the same time"
"Meet (someone) face to face with hostile or argumentative intent"
"Force (something unwelcome or unfamiliar) to be accepted or put in place"
"Communicate or work in relation to each other"
"A fact or piece of data from a study of a large quantity of numerical data."
"Easily affected, influenced, or harmed by something"
"The state of being away from a place or person"
"(of a situation or event) extremely serious or urgent"
"A difference especially between things that should be the same"
"The quality or state of being equal"
"Going beyond what is usual, normal, or proper"
"Something people do to relax or have fun"
"Difficult to carry or move because of its size, shape, or weight"
"Impossible to pass, cross, or travel over"
"Make small movements, especially of the hands and feet"
"To include (something) as part of something else"
"Something that blocks a road or path"
"Having a desire to know or learn more"
"The courses that are taught by a school, college, etc."
"A device that holds two things firmly together"
"To do something that does not obey or follow (a rule, law, etc.)"
"Go hurriedly through (a place) stealing things and causing damage"
"White or glowing because of great heat"
"An old and well-known saying that expresses a general truth"
"Not able to be explained or understood"
"The end or final result of something"

string-array.name: IELTS_example1
string-array.item: "They put up a good defense, but the city ultimately fell to the invaders."
"Could the rise of robots have a negative impact on employment?"
"There is a very high level of pollution in the rivers"
"Despite the harsh conditions of his childhood, the support of his family made it a happy one."
"The man consumed the entire bag of popcorn by himself."
"My favorite aspect of living in the countryside is the atmosphere of calm."
"If you're going to go on vacation abroad, you need a passport."
"Working hard and loving what you do are key ingredients for success."
"One of my brother's greatest characteristics is his fearlessness."
"Performing such a challenging task requires very particular skills."
"She has a reputation for being rather irresponsible."
"The store replaced my TV because it had a defect."
"The number of children living in poverty decreased last year."
"Investment in this country is inhibited by the unstable political climate."
"The national health service was far from adequate."
"The price of the item has been reduced to compensate for a defect."
"The country is going through a crucial moment in its development."
"A job is not merely a means to earn a living."
"It is obvious that you don't care at all about my feelings."
"The spread of the disease reached epidemic dimensions this week."
"We need to install speed bumps to reduce the speed of the cars on this street."
"It's a very tricky problem, but I think there are a number of things you can do."
"Old people are particularly vulnerable members of our society."
"The government had to alter its foreign policy."
"He was given the benefit of the doubt."
"She made elaborate preparations for the party."
"There is considerable evidence that global warming is real."
"Her help is vital to the success of this plan."
"The government's efforts to stabilize prices have not succeeded."
"The state contributed €5 million to repair the damage caused by the earthquake."
"Have you read Dan Brown's new book? It's fascinating."
"It seems to me that she has a tendency to exaggerate."
"We communicated with each other by a gesture."
"She always sees the humorous side of a situation instead of getting depressed about things."
"The two banks merged to form one large institution."
"He quickly became prominent in the music industry."
"About eighty thousand spectators packed into the stadium last night."
"Can we go to a different venue?"
"The team and its fans paraded down the street."
"The only drawback to my apartment in New York was it had no bathtub."
"Our company provides the most efficient Internet service in the city."
"The teacher equipped the students with goggles and rubber gloves for the experiment."
"Freight was piling up in the port due to the dockworkers' strike."
"Technological innovation is the key to tackling the problem of climate change."
"We've been suffering under an intense heat wave for days."
"Removing more trees that are planted accelerates climate change."
"The company offers its employees financial incentives to work in more isolated areas of the country."
"I won't deny that physical attributes are important when choosing a potential partner."
"The creators of the vaccine were praised for ages."
"A person should be judged more by their deeds than their words."
"Scholars believe that the ancient city of Troy is in modern-day Turkey."
"They should settle their differences and be friends again."
"I couldn't find any affordable meal at that fancy restaurant."
"My neighbors decided to dedicate their time to cleaning up the neighborhood."
"Miss Wilder, how do you maintain proper discipline in your classroom?"
"Her chemistry professor saw that she was a truly gifted scientist."
"Mediterranean countries are known for their moderate climate"
"I didn't expect to touch on such profound ideas in a chemistry class."
"We use a sophisticated technique of biological water purification"
"In March, the government will unveil its new strategy for tackling climate change."
"While offering free products can attract customers, it's not a viable business plan."
"We cruised from Florida to California, passing through the Panama Canal."
"Political and social turbulence is on the rise in anticipation of the national elections."
"I need to sell my car and buy something newer and more reliable."
"She resorts to games in order to sustain her students' interest when teaching math."
"Our cottage doesn't have insulation because we're only here in the summer."
"Stephanie's vanity wouldn't allow her to be seen in public while she was recovering from her accident."
"Wait until I call your name before you respond to my question."
"As a percussionist, Pedro was always accumulating all kinds of instruments."
"We need to be willing to adapt our business strategy as times change."
"The school board determined the best way to distribute the funds to all the programs the school offered."
"The water flowing into the lake has been insufficient to replace what is lost to evaporation."
"I really like the fringe on your sweater."
"A prolific author [=an author who writes many books]"
"Plants that thrive [=grow well] in the desert"
"The police are conducting an investigation into last week's robbery."
"Tolerance is essential in a diverse community."
"It is a very competitive job market. [=a situation in which a lot of people are trying to get jobs]"
"She acknowledged that her opponent had won, but she wouldn't acknowledge her loss."
"She has been undergoing treatment for severe/deep depression."
"I'm sure he'll go far in life because he's so industrious."
"Each candidate claims to have a plan to rejuvenate the sagging economy."
"The boom in the industry resulted in a severe deforestation of the area."
"How do the plants survive in such a hostile environment?"
"The jungles of Madagascar are the lemur's only natural habitat."
"There is government support for merchants who work in retail and wholesale."
"The comedian stirred up controversy with his comments about obese people."
"He's always up on the latest fashion trends."
"Montse devoted years to developing the vaccine in her laboratory."
"Doctors are excited about the new drug's potential benefits."
"Kevin administers a fund for children's cancer research."
"He needed a mentor to teach him about the world of politics."
"She had turned him down for a date before, but he persisted and asked her again."
"We were going to have a picnic but the rain disrupted our plans."
"Manny was shocked to learn that the moon does not emit light."
"The sale of cigarettes has declined for the third consecutive quarter."
"The finance department estimates that there will be a 10% loss this year."
"The primary cause of the protests was corruption in the government."
"The family ended up looking further outside the city for a more economical apartment."
"Inevitably, you will have to pay off your credit card debt before trying to buy a house."
"Dagoberto moved into an apartment in a residential area next to the university where he's studying."
"The bridge was built under the supervision of a prominent engineer."
"We have a great lineup of speakers and participants for our conference in London this summer."
"He usually orders strawberry ice cream but opted for chocolate this time."
"The city has burgeoned in recent years under the leadership of Mayor Grant."
"The company is promoting their new product."
"The health project will be implemented next year."
"The priest suffered acute embarrassment when he was caught reading "Lolita" by Nabokov."
"To avoid exposing yourself to computer threats, never click on links to files from strangers."
"I can see you're busy, so I won't hinder you any longer."
"Two of the most important knots to learn are the figure-eight and the bowline."
"Scars marked his face from ritual cuttings done in his tribe."
"Different types of rock will normally erode at vastly different rates."
"His popularity extends from city to city"
"Intelligence agencies intercepted a series of telephone calls"
"Blood is the ﬂuid responsible for the circulation of nutrients."
"The mad cow disease caused many unfortunate cows to degenerate, forcing many to avoid eating beef."
"The police found a porous dead body in the middle of the city."
"My wife and I tried very hard to have children, but apparently she's infertile."
"Many companies are trying to reduce the emission of greenhouse gases"
"It was to facilitate my studies that I came here."
"He is irreplaceable in her heart, she feels pampered, spoiled and loved."
"Picas are diurnal, active throughout the year, and have a characteristic call, chickck-chickck."
"I cannot endure that noise a moment longer."
"Writing that whole report in one night was quite a feat."
"If one really wants to go for optimal health the answer is the more the better."
"All European domestic cattle belong to the same species."
"Don't stray from the main point of the question."
"The surface of Mars is remarkably diverse."
"We have developed some new mechanisms for tracking our service to individual customers"
"Helen wore a wig to hide her sparse hair."
"Direct sunlight will scorch the plant's leaves."
"The competition is based on the principle of fair play."
"By the morning, there was just a wisp [=bit] of snow left on the ground."
"I was dehydrated, so the doctor put a saline solution in my IV."
"Racist or sexist behavior will not be tolerated."
"Old habits will sometimes be resurrected unconsciously."
"Say the word Australia and a vision of beaches and blue seas immediately springs to mind."
"The contrast in weather between New York and Rio de Janeiro in January could not be starker."
"Just as Guillermina stepped out of the building, a chunk of concrete fell right in front of her."
"They have been accused of engaging in smuggling."
"Thanks to its innovative design, the new car model combines style and speed."
"Childhood obesity is an increasingly common problem in this country."
"The program is designed to address both physical and emotional health."
"The criminal is being pursued by police."
"The pay raise was a stimulus for production."
"The company claims that its product is better than the leading brand. [=the brand that sells the most]"
"Her stories are peppered with exotic characters with extravagant names."
"There was a man juggling in the square, trying to get money from tourists."
"In one of his most famous stunts, Jackie Chan leaps across an alley and lands on a fire escape."
"After the final performance, the director threw a party for the cast."
"Family photographs were displayed on the wall."
"Selling food will increase the club's ability to generate revenue/income."
"Diesel locomotives began to supersede steam locomotive in the fifties"
"That look of grief would be imprinted on her mind forever."
"My initial surprise was soon replaced by delight."
"A large group of the American populace attends church regularly."
"She saw them embrace on the station platform."
"To foster her flair for acting, my sister went to drama school."
"I saw her a week after they'd had the argument and she was still fuming."
"I couldn't get my brain to function or coordinate my muscles."
"If you can read this sentence and write one of your own, you possess literacy."
"They put up a marble tablet in memory of his father."
"The government has only made a token gesture towards helping the unemployed."
"Through all of his life experiences, he became a sage to others."
"No one knows when or where the idea (first) originated"
"All the local forecasters are predicting rain for this afternoon."
"A floral display/design [=a display/design that has pictures of flowers]"
"The king reigned in a time of peace and prosperity."
"The facts emerged after a lengthy investigation."
"His singing is reminiscent of the crooners of the '40s and '50s."
"This discussion has renewed my hope of finding a solution to the problem."
"The whole town was excited about the visit, notably the children."
"Cripple is an old-fashioned word. People now usually use the less offensive term disabled person."
"He attempted to lure her away from husband and family."
"A landlord may retain part of your deposit if you break the lease."
"He was reading a math textbook in the dormitory."
"You will have to compete with others for this position."
"He made us all nervous by standing so close to the edge of the cliff."
"Some students need motivation to help them through school."
"Simon Lane quickly found his niche as a busy freelance model maker."
"Liza was so frightened she couldn't make a sound."
"The sleeves covered his hands to the tips of his fingers."
"The experience created a very special bond between us."
"I managed to convince myself that I was doing the right thing."
"The families of the victims may rest assured that justice will prevail."
"The barber gave him the haircut for free after he accidentally shaved his sideburns."
"It was a bad crash, but his condition is not serious."
"I experience a sharp sensation in my teeth when sipping a hot beverage."
"The Prime Minister is determined to forge a good relationship with America's new leader."
"If you're lucky, a splendid golden eagle may soar into view."
"Martin Parry, the author of the report, says it's time for concerted action by world leaders."
"It was the last government's policies that caused the downturn the country is going through now."
"Those teaching methods are still prevalent at some schools."
"I stopped and waited for her to catch up."
"I stood there wondering what to do, but my sister was more decisive and immediately went to the phone."
"He spent his adolescent years playing guitar in the church band."
"We were surprised when their apparently [=seemingly, ostensibly] happy marriage ended after only two years."
"The disease has now been completely eradicated."
"She never unfolded her secret to anyone and took it to her grave."
"This discovery seems to validate the claims of popular astrology."
"She refused to let the injury keep her from attaining her goal of being in the Olympics."
"Talent and creativity abound in this environment, and everything is done to encourage them."
"He seemed incapable of understanding the seriousness of the situation."
"Motorists were warned to beware of slippery conditions."
"P and G applied for a patent on its cookies."
"She has just landed the lead role in The Young Vic's latest production."
"Its recommendations are based on detailed comparisons between the public and private sectors"
"I can't imagine a circumstance in/under which I would do that."
"With support and encouragement from their parents, the students organized a fundraiser."
"Put the soap and water in a pan and leave to stand until they have blended."
"Astronomers discovered a star with an oxygen atmosphere, defying conventional theories."
"She's been one of the most dominant players in women's tennis for years."
"Kirsten closed her eyes and began to recite "The Road Not Taken," by Robert Frost."
"Paul was a shy, pleasant, solitary man."
"Their lives were enriched by the experience. = It was a life-enriching experience for them."
"His academic peers [=people in the same grade or level of school]"
"The assessment for the course involves written assignments and practical tests."
"He scored well on the verbal section of the test."
"His perseverance was rewarded: after many rejections, he finally found a job."
"Most of the Romance languages are similar because they all derive from Latin."
"I filed for divorce on the grounds of adultery a few months later."
"Where does the inspiration for your art come from?"
"Jeremy can't work because he has to look after his invalid father."
"The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National."
"Through the refinement process, all transgenic material has been removed."
"Your credit card is no longer valid."
"A pump was used to create a vacuum inside the bottle."
"Some people sue over the most minor things."
"The piano and organ were tuned to the same pitch"
"Additives are used to prolong the shelf life of packaged food."
"Detectives confirmed some of his injuries were caused by a boat propeller."
"She tilted the mirror and began to comb her hair."
"A tidal wave caused by the earthquake hit the coast causing catastrophic damage."
"He made some inquiries and discovered she had gone to the Continent."
"She gripped the pipe with both hands, trying to snap it in half."
"I had to ask my brother to tow my car because my battery died when I was on the highway."
"There is a vast array of literature on the topic."
"They offered no solution for all our myriad problems."
"Increased ultraviolet radiation may disrupt terrestrial ecosystems."
"The local vegetation is flourishing as a result of the recent rains"
"Amphibians live partly in water and partly on land."
"The grill was covered in a greasy residue from the hamburgers."
"A high level of biodiversity is desirable."
"A half of the earth, usually as divided into northern and southern halves by the equator, or into western and eastern halves by an imaginary line passing through the poles."
"It's imperative that I speak with Jeremiah immediately"
"A large, soft tomato, unerringly aimed, stuck the chairman in the face."
"Tom asked Mary if she'd go to Goya's art exhibit."
"The hiring of the new CEO diluted the power of the company's president."
"If you're rough on your toys, the ones that don't break are resilient."
"The dunes along the Oregon coast stretch for more than 40 miles."
"Photosynthesis uses sunlight, carbon dioxide and water to produce oxygen, glucose and water."
"All that noise is disturbing my concentration."
"Large spines and some spiny catfish grow as large as a man are as effective as stilettos."
"The organization works to conserve [=save] our national forests/wildlife."
"No community living in full accordance with that code could fail to reach a high moral and intellectual level."
"Grief overwhelmed her. = She was overwhelmed by grief. [=she felt grief so strongly that she was unable to think or act in a normal way]"
"His passive acceptance of the decision surprised us."
"He might agree but seems reluctant to admit it."
"He has to learn to control his impulses."
"The people in the village still observe the ancient customs/traditions of their ancestors."
"His paintings capture the beauty and grandeur of the landscape."

"If a person who is accused of a crime is remanded in custody, or if they are on remand, they are kept in prison until their trial. If they are remanded on bail, they are released and told to return to the court at a later date, when their trial will take place."
"It's an old factory that has been renovated as office space."
"The soldiers raced each other in chariots around the Coliseum."
"A form of entertainment in which a performer plays a character or tells a story without words by using body movements and facial expressions"
"You would not survive a day in this rugged terrain without proper footwear, said the guide."
"Stringent safety rules have been adopted in connection with waste disposal."
"He carved his name on/into the table."
"The train is usually full of commuters at this time of day."
"We plodded through mud that came up past our ankles."
"One punch sent him sprawling to the floor. [=caused him to fall to the floor in a violent and uncontrolled way]"
"My interests encompass [=cover, include] a broad range of topics."
"It had taken three months to excavate down to the bare rock."
"She inscribed her own name on the textbook."
"We're fattening the livestock up for slaughter."
"The reeds along the edge of a pond"
"She will accompany me to the store."
"His photographs evoke the isolation and solitude of the desert."
"This reinforces the stereotype that blondes have no brains."
"The frailty of my health has kept me from traveling as much in recent years."
"Was that really magic or just an illusion?"
"The lawyer portrayed his client as a victim of child abuse."
"A worker put a prop against the wall of the tunnel to keep it from falling."
"Except for very basic slapstick, humor travels uncertainly."
"He is very religious; the corporeal world has little interest for him."
"Now that her father is sick, Ruth administers his finances."
"The mayor promised to put a stop to the rampant crime that plagued the city"
"He cut the plant off at the base of the stem."
"School administrators are trying to fill vacancies before the beginning of the school year."
"Why overburden yourself when people are offering to help?"
"The weather gradually deteriorated [=worsened] as the day went on."
"She was only given a placebo, but she claimed she got better - that's the placebo effect."
"Sailing across the Atlantic on a raft was an adventure."
"There is a breath of spring in the gentle breeze."
"The school endeavors to teach students to be good citizens."
"She enrolled in a salsa class at the arts center."
"She honed her language skills by reading and writing every day."
"We decided to vacation on our own instead of going to a resort."
"Tyrone learned about different types of leaves when he studied botany in college."
"Our boat remained/stayed afloat through the storm."
"The computer program can be personalized to fit your needs."
"Our small company must compete with the big conglomerates."
"The parliamentarian has consistently denied the accusations of corruption brought against him."
"The committee gave its endorsement to the plan to remodel the community center."
"Sandy's arrival made Ben smile for a fleeting moment."
"I pricked my finger when I tried removing the staples from my homework"
"You cannot confer with your fellow contestants on this question."
"The grant the organization got has been a boon for underprivileged children in the city."
"The population increase coincided with rapid industrial growth."
"At that point, we'll have to confront an important decision."
"The judge imposed a life sentence on the defendant."
"They're quiet children who don't interact much."
"The statistics show that teenagers are involved in a high percentage of traffic accidents."
"The operation had left her susceptible to infection."
"You may have to undergo disappointment and failure before experiencing success."
"I submitted the monthly financial reports in your absence."
"Even the smallest mistake could have dire [=terrible, dreadful] consequences."
"My accountant discovered a discrepancy in my banking records."
"All people have the right to equality of opportunity."
"They spend an inordinate amount of time talking."
"I was able to gain invaluable experience over that year."
"Reduction in government spending will necessitate further cuts in public services."
"The country club offers a golf course and a lake for various forms of recreation."
"He trekked across some of the most inhospitable terrains in the world."
"This machine is too unwieldy to move."
"The river's broad mudflats were thought completely impassable."
"The museum is easily accessible by public transport."
"The aisle was floored with ancient bricks."
"The brain responds to auditory and visual stimuli."
"The party leaders voted to incorporate her into the planning committee."
"As a politician, he knows how to manipulate public opinion."
"He was arrested for obstruction of a police officer in the execution of his duty."
"She could see inquisitive faces looking out from the windows next door."
"He is already walking normally and doing remedial exercises."
"Teachers feel that the present curriculum is too narrow."
"The mechanic replaced the hose and secured it with a clamp."
"Doing business with them was an infringement of our agreement."
"Robbers ransacked the apartment looking for money."
"An incandescent light bulb [=a light bulb whose light is produced by the glow of a wire heated by an electric current]"
"The working part of a filament lamp is a metal coil which glows white hot."
"According to the old adage, a picture is worth a thousand words."
"The civil aviation minister ordered all the planes to be grounded."
"Joyce was irritated by the inflexibility of her colleagues."
"The five experiments gave quite disparate results."
"It is universally acknowledged that trees are indispensable to us."
"This theory makes sense of an otherwise inexplicable phenomenon."
"The show marked the culmination of months of hard work."

string-array.name: IELTS_example2
string-array.item: "Attack is the best form of defense."
"Education is one of the most essential aspects of life."
"People often simply abandon their pets when they go abroad."
"Mary mixed the ingredients to make a cake."
"A green color is a characteristic of that type of apple."
"Do you have anything particular in mind? "
"The product is guaranteed to be free from defects."
"The poverty of her childhood stands in total contrast to her life in Hollywood."
"Don't allow your past failure to inhibit your attempt at winning this time."
"The garden hasn't been getting adequate water."
"She used her good looks to compensate her lack of intelligence."
"The ability to separate out reusable elements from other waste is crucial."
"There is no point in merely repeating what we've done before."
"A flu epidemic is sweeping through Moscow."
"Can you please reduce the volume of the music?"
"The troops were in a vulnerable position."
"The kids became ill and we had to alter our holiday plans."
"We can all benefit from his experience."
"This elaborate deception fooled his family for ages."
"I was careful to not leave any evidence."
"International trade is vital for healthy economies."
"The pilots were able to stabilize the airplane and land safely."
"He contributed fifty dollars to the project."
"The book gives a fascinating insight into Mrs. Blair's character."
"I've told you a million times not to exaggerate."
"Sometimes gestures are more expressive than speech."
"His behavior at the party was so humorous that I could not help laughing."
"The day slowly merged into the night."
"Kelley and her husband hired a prominent lawyer, Abbe Lowell."
"A spectator threw the ball back to the players."
"The hotel is an ideal venue for conferences and business meetings."
"She had a constant parade of young men coming to visit her."
"The drawback of driving to work is having to find a parking space."
"We all need to use energy more efficiently."
"It's going to cost $4 million to equip the hospital."
"The freight truck caused a cloud of dust as it went down the dirt road."
"We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive."
"The economic pressures on small businesses are intense."
"The company's sales growth rate is accelerating this year."
"Rewarding a child's progress will give them an incentive to learn."
"Imagination is an attribute of human beings."
"I recognize God as the Creator of man."
"I'm not easily shocked, but his deed was too disgusting."
"Fray Luis de Leon was a poet and scholar who preferred to live a solitary life."
"The date for the wedding is finally settled."
"The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices."
"The nuns dedicated their lives to doing good for the community."
"The soldiers showed perfect discipline under the fire of the enemy."
"Her brother is a gifted artist, but he has some psychological problems."
"The restaurant on the corner has fresh food for moderate prices."
"There is a profound difference between having a plan and having a purpose."
"Our new logo is to be unveiled next week."
"He could not suggest a viable alternative/option."
"Judy enjoyed seeing polar bears while cruising through the Baffin Bay."
"The era was characterized by political and cultural turbulence."
"He's a reliable source of information in the organization."
"The runner struggled hard to sustain the pace."
"Insulation may reduce the danger of pipes bursting in winter."
"She described her accomplishments without exaggeration or vanity."
"I think she liked what I said, but she didn't like the way I responded."
"As people accumulate more wealth, they tend to spend a greater proportion of their incomes."
"If you aren't able to adapt, technology might not be the best field for you."
"The CEO and all the company managers determined the changes they would make to the company's mission statement"
"The Salton Sea would slowly evaporate and life would return to normal, for a while."
"They pitched their tents at the fringe of the open fields."
"She is a prolific writer of novels and short stories."
"The dean tasked me to conduct experiments with new teaching methods."
"This gives the company a competitive advantage over its rivals."
"I acknowledge (the fact) that I hurt you, and for that I am sorry."
"I saw the news and now I'm in a terrible depression."
"A good head and an industrious hand are worth gold in any land."
"Her efforts to rejuvenate her career have so far been unsuccessful."
"Continued deforestation of the rainforest has caused many animals to lose their natural habitat."
"Protecting the environment is every man's responsibility."
"Some animals are in danger because their native habitat is being destroyed."
"We should be able to retail most of these products to overseas customers."
"The band sparked controversy by mentioning the drugs they consumed in their songs."
"Teachers are trying to reverse the general trend [=tendency] of lower test scores."
"It can't be denied that we need to devote more resources to this problem."
"The firm has identified 60 potential customers at home and abroad."
"The hospital has set up a special fund to buy new equipment."
"She was a friend and mentor to many young actors."
"Strength shows, not only in the ability to persist but the ability to start over."
"When minerals such as quartz are heated, they emit light."
"Oil demand declined significantly in the US."
"I estimate the value of the house is around two million dollars."
"If the primary infection is not treated further outbreaks may occur."
"There are unnecessary steps in the production line; we need to design a more economical process."
"The team is so bad this year, they will inevitably lose their next game."
"A law banning loudspeakers in residential neighborhoods at night"
"She's responsible for the supervision of a large staff."
"Each participant was to pay his own expenses."
"People still opt for monogamy and marriage."
"My confidence began to burgeon later in life."
"The celebrity's visit did a lot to promote the restaurant."
"Government support will be essential if the project is to succeed."
"The report has caused acute embarrassment to the government."
"Details of some of the company's corrupt practices have been exposed."
"I wouldn't hinder your work, I'm going swimming right now."
"Something is a knot when you reserve it, a scar when it's opened."
"The tall graceful form of a woman appeared at the top of the stairs."
"A tragic death interrupts their annual ritual"
"Can you extend your visit a few days longer?"
"The fighter plane was ordered to intercept an aircraft that had entered the country's airspace"
"You need more nutrients in your diet."
"Will too much freedom make children degenerate?"
"Since the small nation had porous borders, it was an easy target for invasion."
"The soil proved too infertile to sustain real pasture or arable crops."
"During droughts, farmers are barely able to make out a living."
"The emission of gases such as carbon dioxide should be stabilized at their present level."
"Our trade and development program will facilitate our progress."
"The government has an irreplaceable responsibility in enhancing the social justice."
"I could only spare two or three hours, from my numerous diurnal occupations."
"She wants to make sure her legacy will endure."
"The Eiffel Tower is a remarkable feat of engineering."
"To make the optimal decision, I visually scan as many as possible of the various alternatives."
"The kind lady's house was always open to strays."
"Today's businesses are increasingly complex and diverse."
"He has extreme opinions when it comes to politics."
"Scientists are studying the body's mechanisms for controlling weight."
"Low wages and a sparse population have kept housing prices very low."
"Roast the peanuts while being careful not to scorch them."
"In principle, I agree with the idea, but in practice, it's not always possible."
"There was a wisp of a smile [=a very slight smile] on her lips."
"I bought a saline solution to clean my eyes."
"We don't tolerate smoking in the library."
"She suffered a temporary loss of vision after being struck on the head."
"We compared and contrasted the two characters of the story."
"Each blow of the hammer removed a great chunk of plaster."
"Only 10% of American adults engage in regular exercise."
"She was an imaginative and innovative manager."
"Overeating is surely the main cause of obesity."
"People experience differences in physical and mental capability depending on the time of day."
"She decided to pursue her studies after obtaining her first degree."
"The dog responded to the stimulus of the ringing bell."
"What brand are those jeans you are wearing?"
"The anthropologist's house was filled with artifacts and exotic plants."
"It can be tough trying to juggle a career and a family."
"Tom Cruise has performed his own stunts for Mission Impossible 2, defying warnings from professionals."
"Part of the movie's success lies in the strength of the supporting cast (= the actors who were not playing the main parts)."
"His trophies were proudly displayed in a backlit cabinet."
"The new development will generate 1,500 new jobs."
"My braces made an imprint on the inside of my lips."
"Initial reports say that seven people have died, though this has not yet been confirmed."
"He had the support of large sections of the local populace."
"He leaned over to embrace the child."
"She has a natural flair for languages."
"She's still fuming about/over/at not being invited to the party."
"I need money to be able to function as an artist."
"The program is intended to promote adult literacy among people who have had very little schooling."
"He also studied the ancient stone tablets from around the pyramids."
"The hotel waived her lodging fees as a token of gratitude for helping to apprehend the thief"
"The sage of the Indian tribe was able to heal the badly wounded man."
"She claims that she can predict future events."
"The first syllable of the word doctor is given stress."
"I really like the floral pattern on these curtains. – I don't like them. I think they're hideous."
"The bride was wearing a garland of flowers on her head."
"She reigned over her kingdom for many decades."
"She has emerged as a leading contender in the field."
"The decor was reminiscent of a municipal arts-and-leisure center."
"I need to renew my passport this year."
"These changes will hit ordinary people and notably working women."
"The criminal was lured out of his hideout with a fake offer and detained."
"The TV show has retained its popularity for many years."
"We had a lot of parties in our dormitory in our freshman year."
"She competed against students from around the country."
"If you put the glass that close to the edge of the table, it will fall."
"There seems to be a lack of motivation among the staff."
"I found a niche for myself after high school."
"There was a splintering sound as the railing gave way."
"Hurricane Andrew has passed over the southern tip of Florida."
"I felt a strong spiritual bond with him."
"He convinced me that the story was true."
"The general told his troops that they would prevail against the enemy."
"He goes to the barber every Sunday to get his beard shaved."
"Crime is an increasingly serious problem in a modern society."
"Alcoholic beverages are served in the hotel lounge."
"The blacksmith forged an axe using an ancient technique."
"The two sheets of flame clashed, soaring hundreds of feet high."
"They made a concerted effort to make her feel welcome."
"In times of economic downturn, consumers tend to spend less."
"Severe periodontitis is one of the most prevalent diseases among humans."
"John began the season better than me but I have fought to catch up."
"You must be decisive and persistent to succeed in this competitive field."
"My new fantasy book is targeted at adolescents."
"Apparently, the girls are not at all amused by the whole business."
"They are already battling to eradicate illnesses such as malaria and tetanus."
"The facts started to unfold before them."
"Experiments that are designed to validate [=prove] a hypothesis"
"Jim is halfway to attaining his pilot's license."
"A business in which opportunities abound [=a business in which there are many opportunities]"
"The floor has been polished and it's slippery."
"Shakespearean women's roles were originally written to be played by men."
"There are no previous statistics for comparison."
"If our business is to survive, we must be able to adapt to changing circumstances."
"She blends psychology and crime in her new novel."
"Katy was raised in a conventional family with a working father, a mother at home, and one brother."
"The university has/plays a dominant [=major] role in the local economy."
"He recited the poem/passage with great feeling."
"Hey often have a lonely and solitary life to lead."
"His engaging personality made him popular with his peers."
"The students were given a homework assignment."
"She was a victim of verbal abuse. [=harsh and insulting language]"
"Perseverance is required to perfect just about any skill."
"All of his ideas regarding the new design derived from specific requests from users."
"A number of them have filed formal complaints against the police."
"Her early childhood provided (the) inspiration for her first novel."
"She cares for her invalid husband at home."
"We've been courting some large investors to fund this new project."
"You can ask a dealer for a discount whether you pay cash or buy on credit."
"People injured in accidents caused by the defective tire have threatened to sue."
"Mr. Chester said foreign military aid was prolonging the war."
"A 79-year-old Norwegian pilot who safely landed his light aircraft after its propeller dropped off has been praised for his coolness."
"Leonard tilted his chair back on two legs and stretched his long body."
"When we went camping, we chopped wood for the fire."
"The minister warned that if war broke out, it would be catastrophic for the whole world."

"The woodsman snapped a few twigs and threw them on the fire."

"An array of bathing suits on the beach."
"Terrestrial latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator."
"The void lord is a large amphibian alien."
"The divorce left a residue of pain in the family."
"The memory was so painful that he obliterated it from his mind"
"The United States is in the Northern Hemisphere."
"He bought a new telescope so he could pursue his favorite nocturnal hobby of astronomy."
"He has an unerring sense of good taste."
"He hopes to exhibit his paintings in Japan. "
"We lugged the beach stuff onto the beach, avoiding anything that resembled dune."
"The structure of the leaf allows for carbon dioxide and oxygen to enter and leave the leaf, which is where photosynthesis actually takes place."
"Driving with loud music can lead to a lack of concentration."
"The primary natural resources are spiny lobster, conch, and other shellfish."
"A scientist who is studying ways to conserve [=preserve] biological diversity"
"A gray Toyota van cruised by less than five meters beyond him, its pace slow and deliberate."
"But the intellectual and what is called the spiritual man in him were slumbering as in an infant."

"In her books, women are often portrayed in passive roles."
"Baseball has been a national pastime for years."
"On impulse, she opened the small crystal box where they'd placed the bone."
"There are several opposing theories regarding the origins of ancient Filipinos."

"The judge remanded the case for further consideration."

"The emperor arrived in a chariot drawn by four white horses."
"Randall came back from the Himalayas with lots of photos of the rugged mountains."
"We need more stringent regulations in the financial sector to avoid corruption."
"Busy commuters on their way to work"
"I'm broke, so I can't give you any monetary compensation for the job right now."
"I could hear my roommate plodding up the steps to our apartment."
"She tripped and went sprawling into the table."

"Human remains were found during the excavation."
"His name was inscribed on the trophy."
"According to Greek mythology, the minotaur would only eat human flesh."
"Villagers herded the livestock to high ground to keep them safe during the floods."
"We didn't have fishing lines, so we tried using reeds to catch the fish in the lake."

"The smell of pumpkin pie evokes memories of Thanksgivings past."

"Their efforts have culminated in the discovery of a new cancer treatment."
"Hope showed virtually no signs of frailty until she was into her 90's."

"There is evidence of rampant corruption in the local government."
"The stem of this plant is thin and hollow."

"It makes no sense, therefore, to overburden people with a whole lot of extraneous information."

"The scent of the flowers was wafted to us by the breeze."
"They endeavored to create a government that truly serves its people."

"In some countries, black people do not have equality with white people."
"Testing is taking up an inordinate amount of teachers' time."

"They came panting up to his door with their unwieldy baggage."

"Would you like an aisle seat or would you prefer to be by the window?"

"Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table."

"They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball."

"I can see clearly that the filament in the bulb is broken."
"Perspiration cools the skin in hot weather."
"Remember the old adage — buy cheap, buy twice!"
"The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines."
"It can sew sponge, thin leather with even, smooth inflexibility."

string-array.name: IELTS_example3
string-array.item: "A thick overcoat is a good defense against the cold."
"Technology has had an irreversible impact on society."
"There is a connection between pollution and the death of trees."
"The weather grew harsh, chilly and unpredictable."
"Many people are unaware of just how much food and drink they consume."
"Dealing with people is the most important aspect of my work."
"This village has its own traditional dress, cuisine, folklore, and handicrafts."
"Coconut is a basic ingredient for many curries."
"What particular type of books do you love to read?"
"Sweden has a reputation for advanced and stylish design."
"The shop owner is selling defected clothes on wholesale."
"The country's main social problem is poverty."
"An unhappy family life may inhibit children's learning."
"She was not compensated for the damage done to her car."
"Vitamins are crucial for maintaining good health."
"Your mother might seem overbearing, but she's merely being protective"
"By the look of the clouds, it is obvious that it is going to rain soon."
"The girl's giggles were epidemic, and soon the entire gathering was laughing"
"Do nuclear weapons really reduce the risk of war?"
"I'd advise leaving the car here till you go to the university; parking can be tricky in the town center."
"Children are the most vulnerable members of society."
"She went under many plastic surgeries to alter the way she looks."
"There are many benefits of drinking eight glass of water every day."
"Tom's explanation was very elaborate and helped the young students learn easily."
"The clear sky shows no evidence about raining today."
"It is vital that you workout every day."
"The exercise allows you to move and stabilize muscles in the movement."
"The audience was fascinated by his speech."
"I suspect his claims are not all they seem - he tends to exaggerate."
"She opened her arms wide in an expansive gesture of welcome."
"The film they are watching is delightfully humorous in the best traditions of romantic comedy."
"We can merge our two small businesses into a larger one."
"She was prominent in the fashion industry."
"There were more spectators than I had expected."
"The nightclub provided an intimate venue for her performance."
"After the team won the championship, the city threw/had a parade for them."
"The drawback of having an electric car is its limited range."
"A good teacher can help students learn more efficiently and effectively."
"Our instructor equipped us with scuba gear before we went underwater."
"Cranes were loading the freight on the train to be transported."
"Some of the latest innovations in robotics were showcased at the technology fair."
"Victor put his sunglasses on to shield his eyes from the intense desert sunlight."
"Exposure to the sun can accelerate the aging process."
"As an added incentive, there's a bottle of champagne for the best team."
"Patience is an essential attribute for a teacher."
"He's the creator of a successful cartoon series."
"He was awarded a medal for his brave deeds in the war."
"He is a serious scholar, a genuinely learned man."
"Sometimes siblings are unwilling to settle their differences."
"Day by day electric cars are now being affordable."
"Students dedicate lots of their time in studying."
"Discipline at the military academy was extremely strict."
"She was a gifted teacher who never talked down to her students."
"Even moderate amounts of alcohol can be dangerous."
"Her speech made a profound impact on everyone."
"The scientists developed a sophisticated robot to gather samples from the surface of Mars"
"There are reports that Toyota will unveil a fuel cell car later this year."
"Solar power is now a viable alternative to coal-powered electricity."
"The cruise was advertised as the 'journey of a lifetime."
"The plane hit quite a bit of turbulence during our flight."
"It's not reliable to judge a man only by his looks."
"She was sustained by the unflagging support of his family."
"A professional recording studio needs to have insulation."
"The woman is always feeling after vanity."
"You can rely on him to respond to a challenge."
"The businessman had accumulated an enormous amount of wealth over his lifetime."
"It is really hard for Jim to adapt to the new cold environment."
"Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire."
"When the water is heated it starts to evaporate."
"She's a prolific scorer. [=she scores many points/goals]"
"This hardy mountain folk seems to thrive on the cold."
"We conducted an experiment with magnesium in chemistry class."
"They have a policy of zero tolerance for sexual harassment."
"She's extremely competitive and always likes to win."
"Gradually he began to acknowledge his feelings of love towards his mother."
"He was in the depths of despair/depression about losing his job."
"The immigrants in our community are very industrious, and a lot of them eventually establish businesses."
"He tried to rejuvenate himself by performing physical exercises each day."
"Deforestation is destroying large areas of tropical rainforest."
"Pollution has an impact on the environment."
"Paris is a major habitat of artists."
"He works in retail and sells household products."
"Controversy arose over the use of the chemicals on fruit and vegetables."
"Lately, there has been a trend towards hiring younger, cheaper employees."
"We're devoting all of our energy to rebuilding the school."
"My cousin is a potential singer. I'm sure she'll be a star."
"The fund was established to aid the poor."
"My manager is more than a boss; he is a mentor."
"Despite the danger, reporters persist in reporting what is happening in the Middle East."
"A stroke can disrupt the supply of oxygen to the brain."
"The flowers of this plant emit [=give off] a sweet smell."
"The government has failed to reverse the economic decline."
"The painter's estimate for painting the whole house was 1000 dollars."
"The primary reason for moving here was the weather."
